item.title: Mum jailed after bribing 5-year-old to be 'sexual plaything' with boyfriend
item.description:
WARNING: THIS REPORT CONTAINS GRAPHIC AND DISTURBING CONTENT
A Northland mum has been jailed for almost 10 years for sexually abusing her own daughter - bribing the 5-year-old with chocolate and lollies ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202029/148690287_m_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=The 5-year-old girl was "bribed" with chocolate and lollies to comply with her mother's sexual requests. Photo / 123RF, stock image

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202029/31020936_m_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=A 5-year-old girl was used as a "sexual plaything" by her own mother who - along with her boyfriend - violated the child repeatedly. Photo / 123RF, stock image

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202029/105940635_m_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=The mother claimed her abuse as a child prompted her actions but the judge said she should have known better. Photo / 123RF, stock image

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202029/SCCZEN_A_MC090617NADPOTTER10_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=A Northland woman has been jailed for almost 10 years for using her own young daughter as a "sexual plaything". Photo / NZME

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202029/SCCZEN_A_140616NZHJOHARVEY07_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Judge David Harvey said the woman's offending against her own child was "dreadful". Photo / Jason Oxenham
